headings.usage: All section titles, hero headings, and product names. Use italic variant for emphasis.

body.usage: Paragraphs, navigation, buttons, and utility text.

colors.usage_rules: Use background for main pages. Use secondary for cards/sections. Primary is strictly for CTAs. Text should always be foreground or muted_foreground, never pure black.

modes.marketing: Asymmetric 'Tetris' grid. Use col-span-7 for images and col-span-5 for text.

components.buttons: Sharp or slightly rounded (rounded-sm). Uppercase text with wide tracking. Hover: slight lift and shadow.
components.cards: Flat, no border, transparent background. Image takes 80% height. Text below image, centered or left-aligned.
components.inputs: Minimalist. Underline only or very light border. No heavy backgrounds.
components.navigation: Sticky, glassmorphism (backdrop-blur-md bg-background/80). Centered logo, split links.

hero.description: Cozy living room with warm lighting

branding.description: Abstract minimalist shape for logo mark

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement a 'Slow Commerce' feel: smooth, slow transitions (0.5s ease-out).
Do not use standard Shadcn cards for products; create a custom 'ProductDisplay' component that emphasizes the image.
Ensure the 'Add to Cart' flow is seamless, using a side drawer (Sheet) instead of a page reload.
Use the 'Playfair Display' font for all headings to establish the luxury brand voice.
Maintain the 'Warm Minimalist' palette strictly. No pure blacks or cold grays.
For the Admin Dashboard, switch to a denser grid but keep the warm palette (muted versions) to reduce eye strain.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
